channel.title: Random Rewards?
channel.description:
im making a new gws mini and i want to make it to you get a random item from using a key with the chest.. ide try doing it myself but im a screwup.. soo yeeaa..
random items being the godswords. im assuming its gonna be the misc chance ? close? probly not

item.title: Random Rewards?
item.dc:creator: @nigelthechamp nigelthechamp
item.description:
@nigelthechamp wrote:

sorry you make no sense. and it need to give you a random reward out of 4 choices

Read full topic

do u have it set up to giv u a reward…if so put after that (no space), (then a reward id here)and again and again
